column5: hey guys, finishing up a basement reno and almost done, have the hallway/stairs laminte to install then carpet (which is ordered and in)  I am wondering if any board member in the area of Hamilton has some experince working with laminate and wants to make a few bucks. Finish the basement, wife is happy and I get to go fishing, grounded until complete!!!  Drop me a note.
HTHM helped me with mine and with my daughter's place. You could PM him. Garry2r's
